text: (usake aane se) unakee napharat ko tarakkee hee hotee gayee aur budee tadbeer (kee buraee) to buree tadbeer karane vaale hee par padatee hai to (ho na ho) ye log bas agale hee logon ke barataav ke muntazir hain to (behatar) tum khuda ke dasatoor mein kabhee tabdeelee na paoge aur khuda kee aadat mein haragiz koee tagayyur na paoge
